attributes.action: Tell us if the MOD was intentionally enriching lawyer friends and colleagues by refusing to release documentation
attributes.additional_details: Again, today, we hear of yet another case where the only outcome was the further huge enrichment of lawyers to the tune of TWENTY-TWO MILLION TAXPAYER POUNDS.   As a lawyer, YOURSELF, will you be able to tell us when your legal brethren will consider they have taken enough off taxpayers?  I wouldn't mind so much if the majority of practising lawyers hadn't been trained before university fees were introduced so we taxpayers were paying in advance for our own destruction.
